p: Data presented here is the first bibliographical report on the antioxidant activity of H. gymnocephalum. Furthermore, our results ( Table 2) demonstrated that the essential oil of H. gymnocephalum has poor antioxidant activity against DPPH (IC 50 value > 1,000 mg/L) and ABTS + (IC 50 = 1,487.67 Â± 47.70 mg/L). These results may be attributed to a low antioxidant activity (in these two tests) of the compounds identified in the essential oil of H. gymnocephalum. Four other Helichrysum species ( H. dasyanthum, H. excisum, H. felinum and H. petiolare) were also reported to exhibit also a low antioxidant activity against test DPPH (IC 50 > 100 mg/L) [ 28].
